name: OKHSV
description: OKHSV color space by Bj√∂rn Ottosson - a perceptually uniform HSV based on OKLab. H is hue (0-360), S is saturation (0-1), V is value (0-1). Reference: https://bottosson.github.io/posts/colorpicker/

h.description: Hue angle (0-360 degrees), same as OKLCH hue

s.description: Saturation (0-1), ratio of chroma to maximum at this value

v.description: Value/brightness (0-1), with V=1 being the brightest for that saturation

initializers.title: OKHSV Color Initializer
initializers.description: Creates an OKHSV color from H, S, V values

conversions.description: Converts OKLab to OKHSV using Ottosson's algorithm with Halley's method refinement for gamut boundary
